bibl.title: Menander's Dyscolus. Introduction, Text, Textual Commentary, and Interpretive Translation.

series.title: American Philological Association. Philological Monographs. No.

bibl.seg: Blake Warren E., Menander's Dyscolus. Introduction, Text, Textual Commentary, and Interpretive Translation. (American Philological Association. Philological Monographs. No. 24.)
New York, A.P.A., 1966, 8°, [v]- 225 pp. et 21 pll.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 42 (1967) No. 84, p. 421. - R.B. Lloyd, CW 61 (1968) p. 184. - F.H. Sandbach, Gnomon 40 (1968) pp. 440-442. - José Alsina, StPap 7 (1968) pp. 67-68. - M. Imhof, MusHelv 25 (1968) pp. 252-253. - J.H. Quincey, Phoenix 22 (1968) pp. 266-269. - R.K. Sherk, AJP 89 (1968) pp. 494-497. - W.J.W. Koster, Mnemosyne 4e s., 21 (1968) pp. 432-434. - Jean Kambitsis, RPhil 3e s., 43 (1969) p. 314-316. - J. Lens, Emerita 38 (1970) pp. 240-242. - Francesco Sesti, RCCM 11 (1969) pp. 277-279. - W. Geoffrey Arnott, CR N.S., 18 (1968) pp. 160-163. - Vittorio D'Agostino, RSC 15 (1967) pp. 401-402. - Ch.T. Murphy, CJ 63 (1968) p. 328. - P.G. McC. Brown, JEA 57 (1971) pp. 234-235.
